splash_wlc_txt_1: Welcome to FarmSmarter - we are here to help you grow the seeds of success!

splash_crpinfo_txt_1: Get detailed information about your crops and best planting seasons
splash_chat_txt_1: meet with peer farmers and share and learn from other's experience
splash_started_txt_1: Get so much more from FarmSmarter Web App and Mobile App
login_txt_1: Welcome back to FarmSmarter - we are so pleased to see you again.
login_txt_2: Let’s get you back to where you left off.
new_user_reg: Welcome  to FarmSmarter - we are so pleased to see you. Let’s get started.
link_acct: You're using FarmSmarter anonymously – you can sign up here
or_log_in: or  log in to your existing account
ent_home_help_mssg_txt: This is your personalised farm dashboard where you can access information about, and create new farms. When you click on a farm you will be able to see the fields and crops registered for that farm with lots of other information to help you make the most of your farming life. Be aware that If you choose to delete a farm, all the data for that farm will be lost.
ent_home_no_farm_yet: You don't have a farm yet – now you can add your first farm.
prf_stp_scn_1_inf_mssg: Please enable us to personalize your experience by providing us with basic information about you. Your personal information will not be share with a thrid party.
prf_stp_wlc: Welcome to FarmSmarter - Let’s get to know you so we can give the best service.
prf_stp_usr_tpe_label: Which of these best describes you?
prf_stp_other_usrtp_mssg: this user type is in development but we will connect you with other FarmSmarter users vis the in-app chat service
prf_stp_scn_2_inf_mssg: We wish to celebrate you. Please select your gender and date of birth. User must be 15 years of age and above to use this app
prf_stp_scn_2_inf_title: Profile setup - gender and date if birth
prf_stp_nt_eligible: You appear to be less than the minimum required age to open an account with us
prf_stp_gender_reqd: please select both gender and date of birth
prf_stp_prv_pg: Please go to previous page to select your user type
prf_stp_gender_label: Pick the one that suits you
prf_stp_bday_label: We'd love to celebrate your birthday!
prf_stp_created: Your profile has been created successfully
prf_stp_success_text_1: That's great, your profile is complete.
prf_stp_success_text_3: Now you can get started with building your farm.
prf_stp_success_text_4: You can view and edit your profile at any time by clicking on the profile icon in the top right of the screen.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_1: That's great, your profile is complete.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_2: Now we just need you to verify your email address by clicking the link we just sent to
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_3: You can view and edit your profile at any time by clicking on the profile icon in the top right of the screen.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_4: We are getting ready to welcome your user type to the FarmSmarter community.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_5: In the meantime we will connect you with other FarmSmarter users via our chat forum.
prf_stp_mail_veri_resend: If the email hasn't arrived just click 'resend'
farm_stp_scrn_1_info_mssg: Let's get you started by creating your farm, enter the farm name and your ownership status and click on next
farm_stp_scrn_1_pg_desc: To set up your farm we need a few details to be sure we give you the best advice.
farm_name_txt: Let's start by giving your farm a name
own_stat_text: By confirming your land ownership status we can support you in registering your land and accessing finance later on.
farm_nm_err: Please enter a valid name for the farm
farm_stp_scrn_2_pg_desc: Your farm location will be used when you book deliveries or collections through the FarmSmarter app.
farm_stp_scrn_2_pg_desc_2: You can pinpoint your farm location on the map.
farm_dash_info_mssg: A single dashboard where you can monitor all your farm activies, the weather on your farm and advice from our experts on how to get the best from your farm
farm_dash_txt: You can select a farm to see what is going on.
field_setp_info_mssg: This is where you can name your field before creating a field map. If you don't feel ready yet, come back later and we will still be here!
field_setp_pg_desc: Let's start by giving your field a name
map_field_later_desc: FarmSmarter will not be able to give you the best information about your field until it is mapped.
field_setp_scrn_2_info_mssg: Mark your field by drawing a polygon around the field. Allow geo-location or search your location using the toggle buttons at the bottom of the page. Once your location is set, click on the polygon shape beside the hand icon at the top right corner on the map interface. Click on the starting point of your field to start drawing out your field. Once the field shape is mapped and you have gone round the field back to the starting point, the polygon will authomatically be  drawn out on the map, then you can proceed to save your field. To adjust the shape drawn, you have to click on the hand icon on the map interface, then you will be allowed to chnage the shae of the field by simply dragging  any point on the drawn polygon. removing the drawn polygon is as simple as clicking on 'remove' botton at the bottom right corner of the screen.
field_setp_scrn_2_info_title: locate and draw out the shape of your field
field_setp_scrn_2_pg_desc_1: Now you have named your field let's make a map so FarmSmarter can give you the best advice and calculations for your field.
field_setp_scrn_2_pg_desc_2: Get started by clicking on the draw shape in the top left corner of the map, then you can click on the map to place connected lines around your field. If you get stuck, click the help button.
harvest_crp_info_mssg: By recording your crop as harvested we can help you to keep track of what is in your field and suggest new rotation crops for the next season. A good yield estimate is fine, we will help you monitor your field success as we go along. When you have saved this harvest you can choose a new crop to plant in this field. The harvest date will be recorded as today's date
harvest_crp_info_title: What was your total yield from this crop?
no_harvest: no crop to harvest, please return back to field home page to select crop to harvest.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_info_mssg: Please enter your previous crop in the text box below, we will not be able to give the best rotation advice but will add this to our future crop choices as soon as we can!
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_1: FarmSmarter uses the previous crop information you provide to build a planting plan for your field using best practice crop rotation.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_2: We can also help you monitor the productivity and health of your land by comparing past crop yields.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_3: Don't worry if you have no last season crop, we will help you get started by suggesting crops suitable for your location.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_crp_nt_fnd: Your crop was not found, add the name of your crop
no_lst_seasn: click here if you have no last season crop
invalid_yield_val: Please enter a valid value for Weight and Yield
crp_seltion_yield_info_mssg: FarmSmarter will track the productivity of your farm from one season to the next.By giving your last yield for this field we can help you monitor the health of your field over time. Choose the appropriate measure for your crop and we will calculate the rest for you!
crp_seltion_yield_desc: what was the yield of this crop? please enter a number.
harvest_yield: What was the total yield from this crop last season?
no_lst_season_crp_selected: no crop selected, please return to last season crop
crp_suggt_info_mssg: FarmSmarter will show crops that will improve your soil health through crop rotation and intercropping based on your previous field planting history. Please choose up to a maximum of three crops for planting. A Main crop, a Secondary crop and an additional crop.
crp_suggt_desc: FarmSmarter suggests that you plant up to three of these crops in your field for the best chance of success.
no_crp_suggestion: We don't have any suggestions at the moment for this crop rotation, please select from our full list of crops.
crp_priority_info_mssg: Please select up to three crops to plant in this field. You will need to specify the priority for each crop in order of importance. For example your main crop may be maize and you can choose to intercrop with beans and have an additional crop such as a companion planting selection like marigolds to deter aphids.
nw_season_crp_selec_info_mssg: Select crop you wish to plant for this new season
nw_season_crp_selec_desc: Select the crop you want to grow
plntng_plan_info_mssg: Let our expert review your planting plans so that we can suggest the best planting approach for your crops
plntng_plan_desc: Select your planting date for each crop and FarmSmarter will be able to give you tips and suggestions for each stage of growth.
crops_not_selected: No crops selected, please go back to select crops for the new season
field_hm_info_mssg: This is your field home page where you can manage your crops and get the best advice from the FarmSmarter experts.
field_hm_info_mssg_2: We calculate the crop yields according to the area of your field and an average yield for your region.
field_hm_info_mssg_3: If you have multiple crops in the field then the yield will be proportionately lower than shown.
field_hm_info_mssg_4: Expected first shoots and harvest dates are approximate and based on average growing times for your location. Please monitor your crops carefully to decide when to harvest.
field_hm_info_mssg_5: For detailed information you can use the crop guides for each crop and when you are ready to harvest your crop, just let us know and we can record your harvest success!
field_hm_info_title: Welcome to your field home page
field_hm_tips_mssg: We will make suggestions here to help you manage your crops and soil.
field_hm_tips_mssg_2: Please remember that crop yield and harvest dates will be approximate, so you need to monitor your field regularly.
field_hm_tips_mssg_3: If you have multiple crops in the field then the yield will be proportionately lower than the estimate.
crp_clinic_info_mssg: Our AI crop clinic works by looking at the images you provide of the crop and its symptoms. The better the image, the more accurate diagnosis will be. Please focus on the part of the crop that shows the most obvious symptoms, for example; an entire leaf or portion of the leaf showing the disease, an entire fruit or seed head showing the symptoms. avoid photos showing a whole plant or having hands and fingers in the way of the plant or disease. Good light is also very helpful.
crp_clinic_info_title: Getting the best image for diagnosis
crp_clinic_wlc: Hello, welcome to the FarmSmarter crop clinic. Let’s have a look a the problem
crp_clinic_crp_select_info_mssg: By identifying the crop you are concerned about it will help our crop clinic fast track a more accurate diagnosis.
crp_clinic_dnd_info_mssg: drag an image into the upload section or click to upload an image file of affected crop. The only accepted file is jpegs
crp_clinic_dnd_pg_desc: Now we know what crop is affected you can upload an image for diagnosis.
crp_clinic_result_info_mssg: Our AI crop clinic works by looking at the images you provide of the crop and its symptoms. The better the image, the more accurate diagnosis will be. Based on the image provided, our crop clinic wil identify one or more diseases in your crop image. The disease will be listed with a brief overview of the effects of infection. By clicking on the 'find out more' button you will be able to see detailed information about each disease, how to treat it and methods for preventing disease spread. If the disease diagnosis looks wrong, you can visit our disease library and search for the diseases that are common for your crop.
thanks_info_mssg: If the diagnosis looks wrong we will make a note and review. In the meantime you can see a full list of diseases here:
crp_doc_wel_mssg: Welcome to the FarmSmarter crop clinic, let’s have a look at the problem
crp_doc_drg_n_drp_mssg: Click here  to upload  or drag and drop diseased crop image (PNG, JPG, JPEG)
crp_disease_err_loader: Service not currently available, please try again later
drn_n_drp_crp_fml: drag and drop crop family image here or click to select image file (.PNG, .JPG or .JPEG)
drn_n_drp_crp_disease: drag and drop crop disease image here or click to select image file (.PNG, .JPG or .JPEG)

chat_wlc_desc: Create your username to get started
chats_info_mssg: This is where you can connect with farmers, agri-suppliers, finance providers and other community members to share ideas, get advice and build a strong FarmSmarter community.
mssg_history_unavailable: message history unavailable at this moment
community_forum_info_mssg: Communicate with fellow farmers via FarmSmarter's chatting community
crp_inf_mssg: Get information about crops and the diseases that affects crops.

crp_clinic_range: This AI tool currently identifies limited crop diseases including Maize, Sorghum, Cassava & Yam.
crp_clinic_teach: Every photo you upload will help it to learn more!
splash_wlc_txt_2: FarmSmarter is currently in beta testing phase and we welcome all your feedback as we perfect all the details and add new tools.
splash_wlc_txt_3: Congratulations on being at the head of the field!
crop_failed_mssg: this crop will be deleted from your field crops
settings_saved: your setting preference has successfully been saved
settngs_save_mssg: your selected preferences will be saved
potntial_desc: The disease listed here are the potential diseases that may be affecting your field crops
clinic_mismatch_popup_mssg_1: Our AI crop clinic is still learning and we are not sure that this disease or crop is correctly identified.  Please click 'This Looks Wrong' and we will show you other possible diseases for the crop you identified.
clinic_unidentified_dis: We can’t identify any disease in this image but you can see possible diseases for this crop by clicking the 'find out more' button below
lang_disclaimer: We are developing this service so not all the content has been translated yet, but will be coming soon
lang_search_note: Language search is only available in english
